user_query: I'm planning a family movie night and we want to watch an anime. Can you suggest an anime quote from Fairy Tail and provide us with a list of available anime? Also, could you recommend some top-ranked Netflix Original Series that are suitable for family viewing?

TaskList.description: Fetch a quote from the anime Fairy Tail.
Retrieve a list of currently available anime.
Get recommendations for top-ranked Netflix Original Series suitable for family viewing.
